name: The Wall (itch) (Death is a Whale)
description:
Night duty on the wall is not exciting. The night watch shoot the shit and try and keep warm. 

Psalm 8: The Wall is a visual novel slash put a log on the fire simulator. 

Psalms is an anthology of short digital fiction. Some entries are games, others are visual novels. And some - well, you'll see. Check in for new psalms every quarter.
